ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (star_ind X R (fun x z => plus R x z)).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : plus R x y H2 : star R y z The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "?X -> ?X -> Prop".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment r : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X H : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (P : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P x x) -> (forall y x z : X, R x y -> star R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x x0 : X, star R x x0 -> P x x0 X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H2 : star R y z x0 : X H0 : R x x0 H3 : star R x0 y Unable to unify "star R ?M2196 ?M2197" with "r X R x z".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable R.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X1 : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X X : Type R : relation X H5 : forall x y : X, plus R x y -> star R x y H : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (P : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P x x) -> (forall y x z : X, R x y -> star R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x x0 : X, star R x x0 -> P x x0 X0, r : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X y, x, z : X H2 : star R y z x0 : X H0 : R x x0 H3 : star R x0 y Unable to unify "star R y z" with "r X R x z".

original: intros y x z H1 H2. apply (star_ind X R (fun x z => plus R x z)). - apply plus_star. - apply H1. - apply H2.
